description: It refers to the chest pain experienced by the patient -(0,1,2,3)
Blood pressure of the patient while resting(in mm/Hg)
The blood sugar of the patient while fasting
It is the ST depression induced by exercise relative to rest(ST relates to the position on ECG plots)
It refers to the slope of the peak of the exercise ST-Segment- (0,1,2)
It refers to thalassemia which is a blood disorder - (0,1,2,3)
The patient has heart disease or not - (1=Yes, 0=No)
